Horrific Maw Bite.name: Horrific Maw Bite
Horrific Maw Bite.flavor: Your jaw distends, and your teeth glow with blue flames.
Horrific Maw Bite.attack:
Strength + 2 vs. AC, Constitution + 2 vs. AC, or Dexterity + 2 vs. AC
Increase the bonus to attack rolls to +4 at 11th level and +6 at 21st level.
Horrific Maw Bite.onHit: 1d12 + Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity modifier damage.

Plague Lash.name: Plague Lash
Plague Lash.flavor: A whip of flickering blue light passes through your foe’s chest and takes away something vital.
Plague Lash.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, Wisdom vs. Fortitude, or Charisma vs. Fortitude
Plague Lash.onHit: 1d6 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier psychic damage. Each time the target attacks on its next turn, it also coughs up sickly blue-black blood, taking 5 necrotic damage.

Burning Focus.name: Burning Focus
Burning Focus.flavor: Blue flame washes around you before you focus it down your blade.
Burning Focus.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Burning Focus.onHit: 2[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier fire damage.
Burning Focus.effect: All creatures adjacent to you take 1d6 + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier fire damage.

Spellmirror.name: Spellmirror
Spellmirror.flavor: The space around you reflects your enemy’s attack.
Spellmirror.trigger: A creature misses you with an attack
Spellmirror.target: The triggering creature in the burst
Spellmirror.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, Wisdom vs. Reflex, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Spellmirror.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage; this damage is of the same type (or types) as the attack that missed. The target also gains any effect  (and its duration) that its attack would have inflicted on you.
Spellmirror.onMiss: Half damage, and the attack does not produce any effects.

Spelleater.name: Spelleater
Spelleater.flavor: The magic burned away to nothing before it could strike you.
Spelleater.effect: Add 4 to your Fortitude, Reflex, and Will defenses against this attack. If the attack misses, you regain hit points equal to one-half the level of the attacker or effect.

Plague of Rooted Majesty.name: Plague of Rooted Majesty
Plague of Rooted Majesty.flavor: Thick roots ground you in the earth at your feet.
Plague of Rooted Majesty.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you reduce pull, push, and slide effects by 1 and cannot be knocked prone. Your speed drops by 2, and you gain a climb speed equal to your adjusted speed.

Scar-Carving Blade.name: Scar-Carving Blade
Scar-Carving Blade.flavor: Blisters rise on your sword hand and burst, spilling forth redblue burning blood that crawls up your blade as you strike.
Scar-Carving Blade.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Scar-Carving Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage, and the target is smeared with your burning spellscarred blood. Your next successful attack against
the target before the end of your next turn causes 5 extra fire and necrotic damage.

Call of the Plague.name: Call of the Plague
Call of the Plague.flavor: An intangible force pulls enemies close before a wave of flame washes over them.
Call of the Plague.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, Wisdom vs. Fortitude, or Charisma vs. Fortitude
Call of the Plague.secondaryTarget: Each creature within 2 squares of you
Call of the Plague.secondaryAttack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, Wisdom vs. Reflex, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Call of the Plague.secondaryOnHit: 1d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier fire damage + 1d10 damage, and you push the target 1d6 squares.

Blurring Blade.name: Blurring Blade
Blurring Blade.flavor: Your blade seems to become one with your body as you move it around you with incredible speed.
Blurring Blade.effect: Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes ongoing 5 fire and necrotic damage (save ends).

Terrible Imposition.name: Terrible Imposition
Terrible Imposition.flavor: You step inside your enemy and burn it from within.
Terrible Imposition.target: One creature of your size or larger
Terrible Imposition.attack: Intelligence + 2 vs. Fortitude, Wisdom + 2 vs. Fortitude, or Charisma + 2 vs.  Fortitude Increase the bonus to the attack roll to +4 at 11th level and +6 at 21st level.
Terrible Imposition.onHit: You disappear into a distortion of space you create inside the target. You have  line of sight and line of effect only to the target, and no creature has line of sight or line of effect to you. The target is slowed and takes 10 damage at the start of its turn. On your next turn, you can deal 5 fire damage to the target as a minor  action, and you can attack the target as though you were adjacent to it (though it cannot make opportunity attacks against you). At the end of that turn, you appear in a space of your choice adjacent to the target.
Terrible Imposition.onMiss: 5 damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Haunting Reception.name: Haunting Reception
Haunting Reception.flavor: The blow seems to rend your body completely, and the remnants burn with blue flame. Then you strike your enemy from behind.
Haunting Reception.trigger: You take damage from an attack
Haunting Reception.effect: You disappear. At the start of your next turn, you reappear in any unoccupied space within 5 squares of the creature that attacked you, and the creature that attacked you grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Plaguefire Body.name: Plaguefire Body
Plaguefire Body.flavor: You feel your bones burning with an inner fire, and those around you see the faint outline of your skeleton glowing through your skin.
Plaguefire Body.effect: End one poison, disease, charm, or fear effect that currently affects you.

Reach of the Doomed.name: Reach of the Doomed
Reach of the Doomed.flavor: Your arms elongate to reach your enemy, as your drying skin cracks and falls to the ground, where it burns away with blue flame.
Reach of the Doomed.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Reach of the Doomed.onHit: 2[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage. You can spend a healing surge to make a secondary attack against the target.
Reach of the Doomed.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. Fortitude, Dexterity vs. Fortitude, or Constitution vs. Fortitude
Reach of the Doomed.secondaryOnHit: 2d10 poison damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Cursed Grasping Air.name: Cursed Grasping Air
Cursed Grasping Air.flavor: Bands of twisting force grasp your enemies and pull them toward one another.
Cursed Grasping Air.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, Wisdom vs. Reflex, or Charisma vs. Reflex, one attack per target
Cursed Grasping Air.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage. If you hit both targets, you slide one target to be adjacent to the other.

Venomous Bloodfang.name: Venomous Bloodfang
Venomous Bloodfang.flavor: Your blood runs up your blade toward your foe, becoming tinged a sickly green as it inches toward your foe’s wound.
Venomous Bloodfang.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Venomous Bloodfang.onHit: 1[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage + 2d6 necrotic damage. You regain hit points equal to twice the necrotic damage you dealt.

Burning the Plagued Bellows.name: Burning the Plagued Bellows
Burning the Plagued Bellows.flavor: Your blue flamebreath infuses your targets with the essence of the Spellplague.
Burning the Plagued Bellows.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, Wisdom vs. Reflex, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Burning the Plagued Bellows.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier fire damage.
Burning the Plagued Bellows.sustainMinor: Each target you hit burns with arcane fire (save ends). Until a target saves, you can repeat the attack against it when you sustain the power. On a hit, the attack instead deals 1d8 fire damage to the target and to each creature adjacent to it.

Submission of the Earth.name: Submission of the Earth
Submission of the Earth.flavor: You drive your foe into the flaming maw that has opened in the earth at your command.
Submission of the Earth.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Submission of the Earth.onHit: 3[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage and the target is immobilized (save ends both).
Submission of the Earth.onMiss: Half damage, no ongoing fire damage, and the target is not immobilized.

Scar of Blue Wings.name: Scar of Blue Wings
Scar of Blue Wings.flavor: Wings of blue flames manifest, rolling outward from behind your shoulder blades like unfurling sails.
Scar of Blue Wings.effect: You gain a fly speed of twice your speed for this move action.

Tears of Fire and Blood.name: Tears of Fire and Blood
Tears of Fire and Blood.flavor: Tears of blood and blue fire roll down your cheeks, and the smell of your cooking flesh fills the air.
Tears of Fire and Blood.effect: You take fire damage equal to your level. If the missed attack would have hit with a +4 power bonus, the attack hits instead.

Lines in Burning Sand.name: Lines in Burning Sand
Lines in Burning Sand.flavor: A cage of blue fire springs from the ground around your enemies.
Lines in Burning Sand.attack: Intelligence vs. AC, Wisdom vs. AC, or Charisma vs. AC
Lines in Burning Sand.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier fire damage.
Lines in Burning Sand.effect: The burst creates an area of fire until the end of your next turn. A creature must spend an extra 3 squares of movement to go from a square in the area to one outside it. When a creature leaves the area, it takes 1d10 fire damage.

Spellmother's Embrace.name: Spellmother's Embrace
Spellmother's Embrace.flavor: Your arm becomes gelatinous and stretches to engulf a nearby foe.
Spellmother's Embrace.requirement: You must have an empty hand.
Spellmother's Embrace.attack: Strength + 2 vs. Fortitude, Dexterity + 2 vs. Fortitude, or Constitution + 2 vs.  Fortitude Increase the bonus to the attack roll to +4 at 11th level and +6 at 21st level.
Spellmother's Embrace.onHit: You grab the target. It takes 5 acid damage at the end of each of its turns until it is no longer grabbed by you.

Infliction of the Flamemist.name: Infliction of the Flamemist
Infliction of the Flamemist.flavor: Where your magic flows, your enemy dissolves into a burning mist.
Infliction of the Flamemist.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, Wisdom vs. Fortitude, or Charisma vs. Fortitude
Infliction of the Flamemist.onHit: 2d10 fire damage, and the target becomes insubstantial, deals half damage with its attacks, gains vulnerable 10 fire and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends all). Fire damage ignores the target’s insubstantial quality.
Infliction of the Flamemist.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not insubstantial, does not deal half damage, is not vulnerable to fire, and takes no ongoing fire damage.

Rabid Chain of Steel.name: Rabid Chain of Steel
Rabid Chain of Steel.flavor: Your spellscarred fervor infects your enemies.
Rabid Chain of Steel.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Rabid Chain of Steel.onHit: 3[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage. The target makes a melee basic attack against an adjacent creature of your choice that has not been attacked this turn. On a hit, that creature does likewise, and so on until an attack misses.
Rabid Chain of Steel.onMiss: Half damage, and no additional attacks.

Body, No Body.name: Body, No Body
Body, No Body.flavor: You fade in and out of existence for a moment.
Body, No Body.effect: You gain insubstantial and phasing until the end of this turn.

Healing Flesh of the Infected.name: Healing Flesh of the Infected
Healing Flesh of the Infected.flavor: A hunk of flesh torn from your body infuses an ally with life.
keywords: Melee touch  Target: One creature  Effect: You spend a healing surge but regain no hit points from it. Instead, the target can regain hit points as if it had spent a healing surge and gains an equal number of temporary hit points.
Healing Flesh of the Infected.effect: You spend a healing surge but regain no hit points from it. Instead, the target can regain hit points as if it had spent a healing surge and gains an equal number of temporary hit points.

Iron Tooth of Bloodlust.name: Iron Tooth of Bloodlust
Iron Tooth of Bloodlust.flavor: Your blade tints red as it draws your enemy’s blood to strengthen you.
Iron Tooth of Bloodlust.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Iron Tooth of Bloodlust.onHit: 2[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage + 2d6 necrotic damage. You regain hit points equal to twice the necrotic damage you dealt.

Mask of Midnight.name: Mask of Midnight
Mask of Midnight.flavor: Your face twists into a horrifying rictus of pure suffering.
Mask of Midnight.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will
Mask of Midnight.onHit: 1d10 psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Spellcurse.name: Spellcurse
Spellcurse.flavor: Your attack conveys more than just steel.
Spellcurse.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Spellcurse.onHit: 2[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and dazed (save ends both).
Spellcurse.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not immobilized or dazed.

Gravity of Moment.name: Gravity of Moment
Gravity of Moment.flavor: You bend the laws of the universe before letting them snap back into shape.
Gravity of Moment.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will
Gravity of Moment.sustainMinor: If the target is in range of the power, slide the target 10 squares.

Donning the Mudflesh.name: Donning the Mudflesh
Donning the Mudflesh.flavor: Your body ripples and flows, allowing weapons to slice right through you with little harm.
Donning the Mudflesh.effect: You become insubstantial. This stance ends if you are bloodied.

Spellplague Guardians.name: Spellplague Guardians
Spellplague Guardians.flavor: You conjure entities of oil and flame that shape the battlefield to your will.
Spellplague Guardians.effect: You conjure five human-shaped creatures. Each occupies 1 square. When you take a move action, you can move each conjuration 3 squares. Enemies can’t enter a square occupied by a conjured guardian, but allies can move through the guardians’ spaces as if the guardians were allies. The conjured guardians grant cover to allies but not enemies.

Hideous Tether.name: Hideous Tether
Hideous Tether.flavor: A black, fleshy goop keeps your enemy from escaping you.
Hideous Tether.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Hideous Tether.onHit: 1d10 + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 acid damage and cannot move more than 3 squares from you (save ends both).

Tongues of the Earth.name: Tongues of the Earth
Tongues of the Earth.flavor: Ropes of earth drip an unsettling ichor as they apprehend your foe.
Tongues of the Earth.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, Wisdom vs. Reflex, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Tongues of the Earth.onHit: 2d10 damage + 1d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Malignant Growth.name: Malignant Growth
Malignant Growth.flavor: A sickly light from your wand bathes your foe, causes it to sprout gnashing, hungry mouths.
Malignant Growth.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, Wisdom vs. Fortitude, or Charisma vs. Fortitude
Malignant Growth.onHit:
4d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier damage, and two devouring mouths sprout on the target. At the start of the target’s turn, the mouths attack two
creatures of your choice adjacent to the target. The attacks use the target’s melee basic attack bonus and deal 1d10 damage. One save by the target reduces the number of mouths (and attacks) to one, and a second save ends the effect.
Malignant Growth.onMiss: Half damage, and one mouth attacks one creature of your choice adjacent to the target at the start of the creature’s next turn.

Contagion Flame.name: Contagion Flame
Contagion Flame.flavor: You set your enemy afire. The flame won’t go out, and it licks outward toward your enemy’s allies.
Contagion Flame.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Contagion Flame.onHit: 2d10 + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage, and ongoing 10 fire and necrotic damage (save ends). At the start of the target’s turn, any creature adjacent to the target takes ongoing 10 fire and necrotic damage (save ends). Creatures that take ongoing damage from this power communicate it in the same manner.
Contagion Flame.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 fire and necrotic damage (save ends). This ongoing damage is not contagious.

Shifting Wave.name: Shifting Wave
Shifting Wave.flavor: A wave of pain washes out from you at your foes. It teleports your foes and friends.
Shifting Wave.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will
Shifting Wave.onHit: 3d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier psychic and fire damage, and you teleport the target 4 squares. You can teleport each of your allies in the burst 4 squares.

Impossible Flurry.name: Impossible Flurry
Impossible Flurry.flavor: You move so quickly and strike so fast that none can see or stop you.
Impossible Flurry.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Impossible Flurry.onHit: 2d10 + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage.
Impossible Flurry.effect: Shift to any square in the burst.

Echoes of Valor.name: Echoes of Valor
Echoes of Valor.flavor: This attack will be remembered, because it repeats itself.
Echoes of Valor.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Echoes of Valor.onHit: 5d10 + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage.
Echoes of Valor.sustainMinor: Repeat this attack against the target. You need not be within melee reach of the target. You can continue to sustain this attack until you miss.

Metamorphosis of Spellflame.name: Metamorphosis of Spellflame
Metamorphosis of Spellflame.flavor: Words only the spellscarred can speak change your foe into maddening blue fire.
Metamorphosis of Spellflame.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude or Will, Wisdom vs. Fortitude or Will, or Charisma vs. Fortitude or Will
Metamorphosis of Spellflame.special: If the attack hits either Fortitude or Will, it hits.
Metamorphosis of Spellflame.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier fire and psychic damage, and ongoing 10 fire and psychic damage (save ends). Each time the target fails its saving throw against this power, the ongoing damage increases by 10. If the ongoing damage kills the target, it dissolves into a mass of blue fire.

Death Vortex.name: Death Vortex
Death Vortex.flavor: Your flesh bursts into ebony-tipped blue flame, burning away your outer layer of skin as the flame expands to encompass nearby creatures in a miniature sapphire vortex.
Death Vortex.attack: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Reflex
Death Vortex.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier necrotic damage.
Death Vortex.sustainMinor: You can spend a healing surge to repeat the attack against all foes you previously hit (even if no longer in range, although still within line of sight) when you sustain the power. On a hit, the attack instead deals 1d8 necrotic damage and you can slide the target 2 squares.
